title: வாக்களிக்க வேண்டாம் என்று ரூ.500 தந்து, கையில் மை வைத்த பா.ஜ.க.,வினர்! - உத்தரப்பிரதேச நிகழ்வு நிஜமா?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Chandauli: Residents of Tara Jivanpur village allege ink was forcefully applied to their fingers & they were given Rs 500 y'day by 3 men of their village. Say, "They were from BJP&asked us if we'll vote for the party. They told us now you can't vote. Don't tell anyone." (18.05) pic.twitter.com/yICJKNPwdt
